column4: Does anyone know of an easy way to install the acx100 driver for wireless cards?
I just put the card in and it worked ?
- that didn't happen for me, D-Link DWL-650+
hehe, same card too! what did happen?
- the card is detected as wlan0 but is not activated, ifup tries to dhcp it but the lights on the card aren't on and it doesn't succeed
in that case the driver is loaded and it's just not finding your router or access point
- I don't think so, the dhcp wireless router is there, the lights on the wireless card are not coming on, there's a link light and a pwr light
at a terminal, do: iwlist wlan0 scanning
just to see what it can see
- okay, the scan completed, and it gives some info
- it has detected the name of our router
- cou;d it have gone through the wired connection to get that?
no, the iw* tools only do wireless - so it can see the router
check to make sure that the router doesn't require WEP or a specific MAC - open that thing up for the world :)
- woot! now what do we do? this other laptop I'm typing on is working fine through wireless
have you configured which network you want it to point at?
